Description: Sherd (base). With three field shield, with sword between two bars. Made of black decorated and turquoise stained and glazed, crackled pottery (buff-grey).
Findspot: Found/Acquired: Bab el-Nasr, MLA register: "Bab en Nasr mounds".
Bibliographic references: Wallis 1891 / Persian Ceramic Art Belonging to Mr F DuCane Godman, FRS: The Thirteenth Century Lustred Vases (Appendix pl.ix.14)
